price: 2. Woh Yallih farmoyta Mucammaday saytun kitooba (Qhuraan kinnuk) yakriye.
arabic: رَسُولٞ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ يَتۡلُواْ صُحُفٗا مُّطَهَّرَةٗ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: rasūlun mina al-lahi yatlū ṣuḥufan muṭahharatan
